nodes.text: Roegr was a male Mandalorian who fought at Nickel One alongside Jaina Solo, Mirta Gev and Vatok Tawr. He held a great dislike—if not hatred—for the Jedi. During the infiltration of Nickel One, his brother died aboard a Tra'kad that had been hit with several mines during a run against the asteroid. After the attempt to kill off the entire Moff Council failed due to Darth Caedus's rescue, Roegr made an attempt to kill Caedus in one-on-one combat only to have Caedus shatter his armor by using the presumed-lost art of shatterpoints. He was then impaled through the chest by Caedus's lightsaber.
